issue.message: Avoid usage of GradleRunner#withPluginClasspath, which is broken. Instead use something like https://github.com/autonomousapps/dependency-analysis-gradle-plugin/tree/main/testkit#gradle-testkit-support-plugin

Avoid usage of GradleRunner#withPluginClasspath, which is broken. Instead use something like https://github.com/autonomousapps/dependency-analysis-gradle-plugin/tree/main/testkit#gradle-testkit-support-plugin
